title: EYA 7: Make the Most of Where You Are (Ft. Brooke Riley)
description:
When you’re in a season full of disappointment, unmet expectations, or waiting, one of the best things you can do is to look for ways to use this time, and this season, to grow and make the most of where you are.

You can volunteer, learn something new, find a hobby, or finish a project you’ve been putting off.

In this episode, Jordan explores one way you can make the most of where you are right now: by decorating your home.

In a conversation with Re-Fabbed blogger and design enthusiast, Brooke Riley, they explore how you can be inspired to look at the season you’re in and the space you live in and make it more beautiful.

This is the seventh and last episode in a series that goes along with Jordan’s new book, Embrace Your Almost.

With content that complements chapter 12 of the book, this episode will help you get creative in the space and season you’re in, and figure out how to decorate your home while honoring your budget.

Tune in to learn:

  • Easy ways to decorate each room of your house
  • Where to find inexpensive home decor
  • How to mix and match pieces, textures, and materials
  • The key decor elements that can change a room
  • Discussion questions to help you make the most of the season you’re in

Want to dig deeper?

  • Hear more from Brooke Riley: https://www.re-fabbed.com/
  • Get a copy of Embrace Your Almost: https://www.re-fabbed.com/
  • Download the free EYA book guide: https://jlmedia.lpages.co/eya-book-study-guide/ 
  • Start the EYA Bible study plan: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/30872
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
